titleStmt.title: St. Pauls life and travels from his conversion. And also his several sufferings, unto his martyrdom at Rome. Collected from sacred scripture and serious historians.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Phillip Brooksby in West-smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place and date of publication from Wing.
Printed in two columns, with ornamental divider and border.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
